body_html:
TensorFlow should definitely report error in this case. It will try to grab all the memory it can get from the system, and if that fails, that should be fatal.

Are you using a recent Cuda driver? We've had several incidents with older Cuda drivers. One remote possibility is that the Cuda driver gives the same memory to multiple running processes, and they all thought they own the memory.
